about_the_game:
This is the art book for Robot Daycare, containing over 45 pages of background information, creator commentary, design sketches, secret illustrations, and before-and-after comparisons to the original version of the game!

Please Note

This book is filled to the brim with spoilers. It is heavily recommended to finish Robot Daycare before looking through it.

How to access

You will find the Art Book in the folder where you've installed Steam: steamapps / common / Robot Daycare

Visual Errors

In case you are noticing irregular white outlines around the images in the book, please head to your PDF viewer's settings and turn off "Smooth Images". This should fix the issue.
detailed_description:
This is the art book for Robot Daycare, containing over 45 pages of background information, creator commentary, design sketches, secret illustrations, and before-and-after comparisons to the original version of the game!

Please Note

This book is filled to the brim with spoilers. It is heavily recommended to finish Robot Daycare before looking through it.

How to access

You will find the Art Book in the folder where you've installed Steam: steamapps / common / Robot Daycare

Visual Errors

In case you are noticing irregular white outlines around the images in the book, please head to your PDF viewer's settings and turn off "Smooth Images". This should fix the issue.
